Class JPEGWriter

    Utility class for writing JPEG images.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public static boolean write(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
            java.io.File file,
            float quality,
            int dpi,
            java.awt.color.ICC_Profile profile)
        Writes an image to disk in JPEG format.
        Parameters:
        image - Image to write.
        file - Destination file.
        quality - JPEG compression quality: 0 (minimum quality) to 1 maximum.
        dpi - Resolution to be included in JPEG metadata (dots per inch)
        profile - ICC profile to be embedded in JPEG metadata (may be null)
        Returns:
        true on success, false on error
